page_content: The page provides information on youth employment regulations, including permissible tasks and working hours.
The page offers a 16-page guide on cantonal scholarships, including tips for filling out the application form.
The page discusses the notification and approval requirements for heating systems operated by gas, oil, or wood.
The page outlines the procedures and requirements for planning and approval of new industrial, commercial, or service buildings.
The page discusses the objectives and legal foundations of combustion control, including air quality, safety, and energy conservation.
The page provides a handbook and guidelines for individual needs assessment for people with disabilities in the canton of Basel-Stadt.
The page provides information on grants for individual component renovation to improve building insulation and energy efficiency.
